CustomField.description: Used for Playbooks to define Direct vs Complex
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( CONTAINS(Acquisition_Program__c, "Birth Plan"), CONTAINS(Acquisition_Program__c, "Sweepstakes"), CONTAINS(Acquisition_Program__c, "WTE_DEALS"), CONTAINS(Acquisition_Program__c, "Your Baby Club API")), "Complex", "Direct")
CustomField.label: Sale Type: Direct or Complex
